title: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project availability inconsistency (1GFKW5S)
description: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S) Now select both P1 and P2.
OB: When having both P1 and P2 selected in the Navigator, the Open/Close project options have inconsistent availability.
EB: Either both Open and Close project options should be available when both P1 and P2 are selected, or neither one should be enabled.
SR:
To reproduce this issue, follow these steps:
1. Create two projects, P1 and P2.
2. Select P2 in the Navigator.
3. Observe the availability of the Open/Close project options.
